name: INGetCarLockStatusIntentResponse
desc: Your app’s response to a request to get the car’s lock status.

items.name: init(code: INGetCarLockStatusIntentResponseCode, userActivity: NSUserActivity?)
items.desc: Initializes the response object with the specified code and user activity.

items.name: var code: INGetCarLockStatusIntentResponseCode
items.desc: The code indicating success or failure when confirming or handling an intent.

items.name: enum INGetCarLockStatusIntentResponseCode
items.desc: Constants indicating the status of the response.

items.name: var locked: Bool?
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating the status of the car’s locks.
